name: Chef Warfare
description:
Chef Warfare is a 2-4 player multiplayer experience where the players must first defeat enemies of their choosing, acquire their resources to cook weapons and shakes, then fight the other chefs in order to win the golden spatula!

Chef Warfare features 3 game modes.

Free-for-All is a 4-player "everybody-for-themselves" game mode.

Team-Up is a 4-player two-versus-two game mode.

Duel is a 2-player one-versus-one game mode.

Each game takes 10 minutes.

For the first 5 minutes, all players are separated in their own zones, and must spawn enemies of their choosing to collect resources and cook better gear. 

After 5 minutes, the walls drop and the players now must fight each other in the middle-area of the map in order to gain points.  After 5 minutes of battle, the game ends and the player with the most points wins the golden spatula!

Chef Warfare is a fun, intense multiplayer shooter where the action is always heated!

Chef Warfare is a good balance between casual gaming and competitive gaming, both which I love.

Chef Warfare is highly replayable.

Hop on with a couple friends and see who the best chef will be!
